Html:
Hi all,

Is there someone can tell me if we can use white map (in fact none) and keep working with coordinates, markers and all objects that this control contains?

Other question, is there a way to change the message on tile "Exception: No data in local tile cache... We are sorry but..." by an other one ?

 

Thanks in advance ;)

 

Kemanke

• ..but what's the point anyway? ;/
  • text on empty tiles: EmptyTileText

Hi Radioman 'n thanks for your quick answer.

For the first point, I want to use polyline drawing, markers, coordinates but without map. Sometime I need map, sometime it's easiest for me to work without any map in the background (only white pane).

I m not really sure to explain what I need exactly as well as I want.

For the second point I m gonna test the EmptyTileText Propertie.

 

Thanks again

Kemanke

Thanks a lot Radioman ;), I m gonna test it ;)

Last Question, I used the EmptyTileText Property but keep having the  "Exception: No data in local tile cache..." in red... Any idea to delete it for all unload tiles ?

Big thanks.

Kemanke

I ve tested MapType = None , there is no probs for winForm but in WPF application you can't move the background with right click ... in winform appli you can?

 

Thanks Kemanke

Hi Radioman,

I ve tested the latest changeset and it seems to be OK.

Thanks again Radioman.

Kemanke
